Lee Chang-dong 's exceptional `` secret Sunshine '' single emotionally ravage experience year . instantly sobering , brutally honest character piece reverberation loss graceful memento morus resonate striking density thought , yet remain inscrutable emotion observe . layered naturalism stunningly trenchant view small-town dynamics , Lee implicitly deconstruct traditional korean melodrama pull apart cinematic excess rip shred arc shape character grounds proceedings crush grind stoic realism . <br /> <br /> `` secret Sunshine '' remain immensely compelling , fluid work throughout 142-minute runtime . bravura first hour fill brim subtextual insinuation , remarkable foreshadowing adroit reversal tone bring humanistic capriciousness . adapt short story , Lee infuse film sensitivity sublime paradox life , last see transgressively comic irreverent `` Oasis '' . understand personal revolution forge view universe change , Lee see emotional cataclysm widow 's sorrow inquire scope also feel tumultuous existential current underpin film religion become narrative scapegoat comprehend heinousness human experience . <br /> <br /> do-yeon Jeon 's -lrb- `` Sunshine '' -rrb- best actress accolade Cannes 2007 well deserve . performance widow shin-ae remain unrelenting enigma . character pull apart force beyond control , sheer magnificence performance central film 's turbulent nature . Jeon essay one cyclonic upheaval another , tremulous sense collapse film , credit , never approach . instead find delicate balance sap charged theatricality subsequent banality ordinary tragedy fallout . become centre film 's universe well . film glorious hand-held CinemaScope , film demolish cinematicism frame composition become visually acute quietly harrowing camera never relinquish gaze shin-ae time happiness , guilt remorse . <br /> <br /> Lee capture detail life small , suspicious town Miryang -- awkwardness communal situation , uncomfortable silence devastation spin personal drama . shin-ae 's interaction townsfolk rarely inspire dividend , especially merely obligation fit sake son , jun -lrb- seon jung-yeop -rrb- . one recur acquaintance jong-chan -lrb- song kang-ho -rrb- , bachelor mechanic uncertain intention help en route Miryang film 's enchant open sequence set captivating stream sunlight . song situate comedic anti-hero South Korea 's biggest film nuanced , low-key delivery purport director 's thought process never reveal plainly necessary . <br /> <br /> pain ephemeral , grief never truly dissipate . Lee find complexity subsistence . shin-ae attempt head path reconciliation face unimaginable heartbreak , unsuccessfully employ fellowship evangelical Christianity foil sorrow . Lee know better understand religion , context human canvas strife misery , never simple solution . Lee never rebuke essence religion realise value salvation higher power even serve form denial . scene latter half deal religion allow become aggressively scornful , feat consider many filmmaker let momentum material take need say true story character . <br /> <br /> Lee 's first film since call office country 's Minister Culture Tourism uncompromising dissertation human suffering . film artless genuine , arduously reveal nothing simple emotional catharsis , suppression abatement agony . `` secret Sunshine '' leave tender mercy pull evanescence , point towards profound understanding despair faith .

Academy award ceremony March 27 , 1957 , Dorothy Malone win best support actress Oscar torrid , over-the-top portrayal spoil heiress Texas oil tycoon WRITTEN ON wind . 1956 potboiler , adapt Robert Wilder 's novel , veritable three-ring-circus showcasing alcoholism , greed , impotence nymphomania . <br /> <br /> Malone 's performance Marylee Hadley , lonely rich girl pick man assuage pain rejection former childhood sweetheart , representative movie whole . mesmerize watch even resort `` lowest - common - denominator '' melodrama , WRITTEN ON wind ultimately work one man , incredibly gifted director Douglas Sirk , émigré pre - World War 2 Weimar Germany leave european theater heritage behind pursue career Hollywood . <br /> <br /> extremely erudite man , Sirk make name 1950 's Universal Studios ' reliable director lavish soap opera , notably Ross Hunter 's production magnificent obsession , HEAVEN allow IMITATION LIFE .
